name: Ride or Perish
description:
Ride through a collapsing city in outer space, escaping from a deadly black hole approaching ever closer!

Credits:

  • Filip Gralak - Programming & Tools
  • Michał Kostecki - Game Design & Level Art
  • Cezary Pospieszny - Tech Art & Level Art
  • Sandra Nowakowska - 2D Art
  • Alan Raczkowski - Music

Assets used:

  • Scifi Sports Car by hammerking1000
  • SpaceSkiesFree by PULSAR BYTES
  • City Kit (Suburban) and City Kit (Roads) by Kenney
